post.text: "No one in our lifetime has ever had as much experience and exposure to the presidency. And yes, she happens to be a woman." â€”First Lady Michelle Obama: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Zane
comment.text: Let's hope she doesn't disappoint. If she does my little sister April will never let me forget. #Hillarylover #hillaryforlife #hillaryandiarebesties #hillaryspelledbackwardsisyrallih

replies.author: Jodi
replies.text: After the election hillory will give to you, what she gave to the flood victims in Louisiana ,her middle finger.
